title: Amnesiac Who Keeps Remembering That They Were Like Different People

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> Whenever you remember who you were, you gain that role's defense, attack, abilities, attributes, and win con.

> You cannot gain a good faction win con.

> You can remember as many times as you want.

fields.name: Win Con:
fields.value: > Complete one of your remembered goals.

desc:
Post 1269
*Oh right! I was the Tarmogoyf! ...Wait no, I think I was Pestilence, Horseman of the Apocalypse... Oh, that's right! I was the Amnesiac Serial Killer!"*
